titleStmt.title: On St. Paul's Cathedral represented by Mr. Dan. King Threnodia adis Paulinæ de seipsa.
titleStmt.author: Benlowes, Edward, 1603?-1676.
King, Daniel, d. 1664?
Loggan, David, 1635-1700?

notesStmt.note: In verse: English (two left columns) and Latin (two right columns).
Although one illustration dated 1658, the verses indicate that the sheet was printed after the cathedral's destruction in the great London fire of 1666.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
